sources.title: Billy the Kid: Showdown in Lincoln County | Full Western Movie
sources.description:
Billy the Kid: Showdown in Lincoln County - A bounty hunter from New Mexico and a gang of horsemen called "Four of the Apocalypse" set their sights on the town of Dogma.
2017.  Stars Dan Beck, Christopher Bowman, Graye Bumgardner

metadata.Plot: Billy Bonney is a hot-headed gunslinger who narrowly skirts a life of crime by being befriended and hired by a peaceful rancher, Eric Keating. When Keating is killed, Billy seeks revenge on the men who killed him, even if it means opposing his friend, Marshal Jim Sherwood.
metadata.Writer: Gene Fowler, Howard Emmett Rogers, Bradbury Foote
metadata.Actors: Robert Taylor, Brian Donlevy, Ian Hunter
